About Us

Learn more about our story and our passion for candles.

Our Story

At New Vintage Luxury Candles, we craft exquisite candles that elevate your space and enhance your life.

Our Mission

We believe that candles should not just provide light, but create an ambiance. Our candles are made from the finest ingredients, with a focus on eco-friendliness and sustainability. We are committed to providing high-quality, hand-crafted candles that brighten your day and your home.

Our Story

Founded in 2024, New Vintage Luxury Candles was born out of a passion for design and the desire to bring warmth into people’s homes. Each candle is crafted with care and attention to detail, ensuring the highest quality. We take pride in our work, offering a wide range of products designed to suit all tastes, occasions, and preferences.

Meet Our Founder: Kim

At the heart of New Vintage Luxury Candles is our visionary founder, Kim. A lifelong lover of home fragrances and an advocate for sustainable living, Kim’s journey began with a simple desire—to create candles that not only smell divine but also bring joy, comfort, and mindfulness into every space they touch.

With a background in design and a passion for craftsmanship, Kim hand-poured the very first New Vintage Luxury Candle in her small workshop. Inspired by nature’s beauty and timeless elegance, she carefully curated scents that evoke memories, feelings, and moments of tranquility. Every candle in our collection reflects her commitment to quality, sustainability, and artistry.

Beyond creating products, Kim believes in making a positive impact. Under her guidance, New Vintage Luxury Candles is proud to champion eco-conscious practices, from using natural, biodegradable materials to supporting local artisans. Her mission is simple: to inspire others to light a candle and spark a little more warmth, love, and care in their lives.

Join Kim on this journey to transform ordinary spaces into extraordinary sanctuaries, one candle at a time.

Why Choose Us?

At New Vintage Luxury Candles, we are more than just candles—we are creators of ambiance, comfort, and unforgettable moments. Here is why we stand out:

1. Premium Quality You Can Trust

Each of our candles is crafted with care, using high-quality natural waxes, lead-free wicks, and premium fragrance oils. We are committed to giving you a safe and luxurious experience with every burn.

2. Eco-Friendly and Sustainable

Caring for the environment is at the heart of what we do. Our candles are made with eco-conscious materials, and we use recyclable or biodegradable packaging to reduce our footprint.

3. Unique and Captivating Scents

Our curated fragrance collection is designed to suit every mood and occasion. From calming florals to energizing citrus notes, there is definitely a scent for everyone.

4. Long-Lasting Burn Time

Enjoy hours of delightful aroma with our expertly crafted candles. Our products are designed to burn cleanly and evenly, offering you the most value for your investment.

5. Handcrafted with Love

We pour our passion into every candle, ensuring a handmade touch that you can see, smell, and feel. Supporting our brand means supporting artistry and attention to detail.

6. Customer Happiness First

Your satisfaction is our priority. From easy ordering to responsive customer support, we are here to make your experience exceptional.

Illuminate your space with candles that are as beautiful as they are meaningful. Choose New Vintage Luxury Candles—where every light tells a story.
